parameters.name: checkin
parameters.description: A complete check-in object.

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: item The updated list item .

parameters.name: tip
parameters.description: The newly-added tip .

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: A list object.

parameters.name: checkin
parameters.description: The check-in associated with this shortId.

parameters.name: checkins
parameters.description: An array of checkin objects with user details present. Usually, venue details are also present, depending on whether the checkin has a venue.

parameters.name: Success
parameters.description: code or error message

parameters.name: venuegroup
parameters.description: A venue group object.

parameters.name: timeseries
parameters.description: An array of venue time series data objects, one for each venue in the group.

parameters.name: venue
parameters.description: group A venue group object.

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: The photo that was just created.

parameters.name: responses
parameters.description: An array in which an entry exists for each response, in the order passed in.

parameters.name: venues
parameters.description: An array of compact venues .

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for this user. ✓ ✓ ✓

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: A user's first name. ✓ ✓ ✓

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: A user's last name. ✓ ✓ ✓

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: Contains prefix and suffix , similar to the format for photo . Accepted sizes are 36x36, 100x100, 300x300, and 500x500 . ✓ ✓ ✓

parameters.name: relationship
parameters.description:
The relationship of the acting user (me) to this user (them). One of self , friend , pendingMe (user has sent a friend request that acting user has not accepted), pendingThem (acting user has sent a friend request to the user but they have not accepted), or followingThem (acting user is following a celebrity or page). If there is no relationship or pending request between the two users, the node is absent. If the acting user is a celebrity, does not indicate whether the user is following them.

If pendingme , applications will want to the acting user to an approve/ignore action. If pendingthem , applications will want to show the acting user a "pending" message. ○ ○ ○

parameters.name: friends
parameters.description: Contains count of friends for this user and groups of users who are friends. Right now will only contain a group where type is friends , but it's subject to change. Groups are omitted when viewing self The full set of friends is at users/XXX/friends . ○ ○ ○

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Present for non-standard user types. One of page , chain , celebrity , or venuePage . Pages are brand pages, such as Bravo , chains are pages that own a set of venues, like Starbucks , celebrities are users that other users can follow, like Mario Batali , and venuePages represent single venues creating content, such as My ArenA creating updates. venuePage's do not really have a user profile, show the veue page instead. ○ ○ ○

parameters.name: venue
parameters.description: For venuePage users, this field just contains an id for the relevant venue. ○ ○ ○

parameters.name: homeCity
parameters.description: User's home city ✓ ✓

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: male , female , or none ✓ ✓

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: An object containing none, some, or all of twitter , facebook , email , and phone . Both are strings. ✓ ✓

parameters.name: bio
parameters.description: A short bio for the user. ○ ○

parameters.name: tips
parameters.description: In compact users, if present, contains the count of tips from this user. In full users, contains count and an array of selected tips as items , which may or may not be empty. Full set of items at users/XXX/tips ○ ○

parameters.name: lists
parameters.description: If this user has lists, groups contains created for lists created by this user. In compact, just the count is provided, and in full, some sample lists are included. In full form, lists also contains a count of the lists created and followed by this user. Full set of items at users/XXX/lists ○ ○

parameters.name: followers
parameters.description: If this user can have followers (i.e. it's a celebrity, venue, or page), contains count of followers for this user in compact, and, in detail, groups of users who follow this user, split into friends and others . ○ ○

parameters.name: following
parameters.description: groups of pages this user has followed. ✓

parameters.name: mayorships
parameters.description: Contains the count of mayorships for this user and an items array that for now is empty. Use users/XXX/mayorships to get actual mayorships. ✓

parameters.name: photos
parameters.description: Contains the count of photos this user has. May contain an array of selected photos as items , full set of items at users/XXX/photos , but only visible to self. ✓

parameters.name: scores
parameters.description: Contains recent , max , checkinsCount , and goal for showing user's current game status. ✓

parameters.name: checkins
parameters.description: Contains the count of checkins by this user. May contain the most recent checkin as an array items containing a single element, if the user is a friend. Users can fetch users/XXX/checkins for their own complete history. ✓

parameters.name: pageInfo
parameters.description: Contains a detailed page , if they are a page. ○

parameters.name: pings
parameters.description: Whether we receive pings from this user, if we have a relationship. ○

parameters.name: requests
parameters.description: Contains count of pending friend requests for this user. ○

info: This is the information of the API
